name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WorkTrips Out of Travel Policy Filter

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes hotels that are out of travel policy from WorkTrips

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WorkTrips has no filter for "Out of Policy" hotels/accommodation - it shows all hotels even though we can't book it, which is wasteful and a bad user experience. This extensions removes all hotel tiles that are marked as "Out of Policy".
